name: Victoria Photography Tours
description: Regular daily small group or private tours. Uniquely created with your interests in mind. 2 hour tours start from the Victoria Tourist Information Centre, run mornings and afternoons, Monday to Friday 9:30AM and 12:30PM (although times can be changed to fit your schedule). Whether you are an avid photographer, or just want to take some great shots with your iPhone, this tour and your host will lead you to some amazing spots. Just some tour examples include: The Legislative Buildings and Inner Harbour, Thunderbird Totem Pole Park, China Town and the famous Fan Tan Alley, Beacon Hill Park, Old Town Bastion Square and Trounce Alley. Just have a comfy pair of shoes, a camera of any kind, and we can make your day special.
